transliteration.en: nahee naik kirapaa nidh paan parai ||18||158||

verse.gurmukhi: ijh Pokt Drm sBY qij hY ]

en.bdb: Those who forsake all the fake religions !

bdb.gurmukhi: ijhVy lok swry ivArQ Drm kwrj Cf idMdy hn

transliteration.en: jeh fokaT dharam sabhai taj hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: iek ic`q ikRpw iniD ko jip hYN ]

en.bdb: And meditate on the Merciful Lord single-mindedly !

bdb.gurmukhi: Aqy iekwgr mn nwl prmwqmw nUM jpdy hn,

transliteration.en: eik chi't kirapaa nidh ko jap hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: qyaU Xw Bv swgr ko qr hYN ]

en.bdb: They ferry across this dreadful world-ocean !

bdb.gurmukhi: auhI (lok) Bv-swgr nUM qrdy hn,

transliteration.en: teuoo yaa bhav saagar ko tar hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: Bv BUl n dyih punr Dr hYN ]19]159]

en.bdb: And never come again in human body even by mistake! 19. 159

bdb.gurmukhi: iPr Bul ky vI jgq ivc SrIr Dwrn nhIN krdy (Bwv mukq ho jwdy hn) ]19]159]

transliteration.en: bhav bhool na dheh punar dhar hai(n) ||19||159||

verse.gurmukhi: iek nwm ibnw nhI kot bRqI ]

en.bdb: Without One Lord’s Name one cannot be saved even by millions of fasts!

bdb.gurmukhi: iek nwm (dy ismrn) qoN ibnw kroVw vrqw (nwl mukqI) nhIN huMdI,

transliteration.en: eik naam binaa nahee koT bratee ||

verse.gurmukhi: iem byd aucwrq swrsuqI ]

en.bdb: The Superb Shrutis (of the Vedas) declare thus!

bdb.gurmukhi: ies pRkwr dy vydw dy kQn srsvqI aucwrdI hY।

transliteration.en: eim bedh uchaarat saarasutee ||

verse.gurmukhi: joaU vw rs ky csky rs hYN ]

en.bdb: Those who are absorbed with the ambrosia of the Name even by Mistake !

bdb.gurmukhi: ijnHw nUM aus rs dw cskw lg igAw hY,

transliteration.en: jouoo vaa ras ke chasake ras hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: qyaU BUl n kwl PMDw Pis hYN ]20]160]

en.bdb: They will not be entrapped in he snare of death! 20. 160

bdb.gurmukhi: auh Bul ky vI kwl dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]20]160]

transliteration.en: teuoo bhool na kaal fa(n)dhaa fas hai(n) ||20||160||

verse.gurmukhi: qÍ pRswid ] nrwj CMd ]

en.bdb: BY THY GRACE. NARAAJ STANZA

bdb.gurmukhi: qyrI ikRpw nwl: nrwj CMd:

transliteration.en: tavai prasaadh || naraaj chha(n)dh ||

verse.gurmukhi: AgMj Awid dyv hYN ABMj BMj jwnIAYN ]

en.bdb: The Primal Lord is Eternal, He may be comprehended as the breaker of the Unbreakable.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus prmwqmw nUM) mu`F qoN hI Atu`t Aqy nw nSt kIqy jw skx vwilAW nUM vI nSt krn vwlw jwixAw jwdw hY;

transliteration.en: aga(n)j aadh dhev hai(n) abha(n)j bha(n)j jaaneeaai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: ABUq BUq hYN sdw AgMj gMj mwnIAYN ]

en.bdb: He is ever both Gross and Subtle, He assails the Unassailable.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) sdw sUKm, sQUl hY Aqy nw tu`t skx vwilAW nUM qoVn vwlw smiJAw jwdw hY;

transliteration.en: abhoot bhoot hai(n) sadhaa aga(n)j ga(n)j maaneeaai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: Adyv dyv hYN sdw AByv Byv nwQ hYN ]

en.bdb: He is both god and demon, He is the Lord of both covert and overt.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) sdw dyv Aqy Adyv (dYNq) hY Aqy Byd-Xukq Aqy Byd-rihq (igAwn dw) suAwmI hY;

transliteration.en: adhev dhev hai(n) sadhaa abhev bhev naath hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: smsq is`D ibRiD dw sdIv srb swQ hYN ]1]161]

en.bdb: He is the Donor of all powers and ever accompanies all. 1.161.

bdb.gurmukhi: swrIAW is`DIAW nUM ivkisq krn vwlw Aqy sdw sB dw swQI hY ]1]161]

transliteration.en: samasat si'dh biradh dhaa sadheev sarab saath hai(n) ||1||161||

verse.gurmukhi: AnwQ nwQ nwQ hYN ABMj BMj hYN sdw ]

en.bdb: He is the Patron of patronless and breaker of the Unbreakable.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) prmwqmw sdw AnwQw dw nwQ (suAwmI) hY; nw BMny jw skx vwilAW nUM BMnx vwlw hY;

transliteration.en: anaath naath naath hai(n) abha(n)j bha(n)j hai(n) sadhaa ||

verse.gurmukhi: AgMj gMj gMj hYN sdIv is`D ibRiD dw ]

en.bdb: He is the Donor of treasure to treasureless and also Giver of power.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) ^zwinAW qoN vwiJAW nUM sdw ^zwny bKSx vwlw hY Aqy is`DIAW ivc vwDw krn vwlw hY;

transliteration.en: aga(n)j ga(n)j ga(n)j hai(n) sadheev si'dh biradh dhaa ||

verse.gurmukhi: AnUp rUp srUp hYN AiC`j qyj mwnIAYN ]

en.bdb: His form is unique and His Glory be considered invincible.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dw) srUp aupmw qoN rihq rUp vwlw hY Aqy (aus nUM) Amuk qyj vwlw smiJAw jwdw hY;

transliteration.en: anoop roop saroop hai(n) achhi'j tej maaneeaai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: sdIv is`D buiD dw pRqwp p`qR jwnIAYN ]2]162]

en.bdb: He is the chastiser of powers and is the Splendour-incarnate. 2.162.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) sdw Su`D bu`DI dyx vwlw Aqy pRqwp dw pRmwx-p`qr mMinAw jwdw hY ]2]162]

transliteration.en: sadheev si'dh budh dhaa prataap pa'tr jaaneeaai(n) ||2||162||

verse.gurmukhi: n rwg rMg rUp hYN n rog rwg ryK hYN ]

en.bdb: He is without affection, colour and form and without the ailment, attachment and sign.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw moh ('rwg') hY Aqy nw hI (aus dw koeI) rUp-rMg hY Aqy nw hI rog Aqy mmqw dI koeI lkIr hY।

transliteration.en: n raag ra(n)g roop hai(n) na rog raag rekh hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: AdoK Adwg Ad`g hYN ABUq ABRm AByK hYN ]

en.bdb: He is devoid of blemish, stain and traud, He is without element, illusion and guise.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) doS-rihq, by-dwZ, swVrihq, BOiqk q`qÍw qoN mukq Aqy Brmw qy ByKw qoN pry hY।

transliteration.en: adhokh adhaag adha'g hai(n) abhoot abhram abhekh hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: n qwq mwq jwq hYN n pwiq ichn brn hYN ]

en.bdb: He is without father, mother and caste and He is without lineage, mark and colour.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dw) nw ipqw hY, nw mwqw, nw jwiq hY Aqy nw brwdrI, nw hI koeI icMnH jw vrn hY।

transliteration.en: n taat maat jaat hai(n) na paat chihan baran hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: AdyK AsyK AByK hYN sdIv ib`su Brn hYN ]3]163]

en.bdb: He is Imperceptible, perfect and guiseless and is always the Sustainer of the Universe. 3.163.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) AidRSt, AnMq (ASyS) ByK-rihq Aqy sdw sMswr dI pwlnw krn vwlw hY ]3]163]

transliteration.en: adhekh asekh abhekh hai(n) sadheev bi's bharan hai(n) ||3||163||

verse.gurmukhi: ibsÍMBr ibsunwQ hYN ibsyK ibsÍ Brn hYN ]

en.bdb: He is the Creator and Master of the Universe and especially its Sustainer.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) jgq nUM Brn vwlw Aqy aus dw suAwmI hY Aqy ivSyS rUp ivc sMswr dI pwlnw krn vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: bisavai(n)bhar bisunaath hai(n) bisekh bisavai bharan hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: ijmI jmwn ky ibKY sdIv krm Brm hYN ]

en.bdb: Within the earth and the universe, He is always engaged in actions.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) DrqI Aqy AwkwS ivcwly sdw hox vwly krmw dw sMXojk hY।

transliteration.en: jimee jamaan ke bikhai sadheev karam bharam hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: AdÍYK hYN AByK hYN AlyK nwQ jwnIAYN ]

en.bdb: He is without malice, without guise, and is known as the Accountless Master.

bdb.gurmukhi: aus nUM dÍYS-rihq, ByK-rihq, lyKy qoN ibnw suAwmI smJxw cwhIdw hY।

transliteration.en: adhavaikh hai(n) abhekh hai(n) alekh naath jaaneeaai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: sdIv srb Taur mY ibsyK Awn mwnIAYN ]4]164]

en.bdb: He may especially be considered abiding for ever in all the places. 4.164.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) swrIAW Qwvw ivc ivSyS rUp ivc sdw mOjUd mMnxw cwhIdw hY ]4]164]

transliteration.en: sadheev sarab Thaur mai bisekh aan maaneeaai(n) ||4||164||

verse.gurmukhi: n jMqR mY n qMqR mY n mMqR bis AwveI ]

en.bdb: He is not within Yantras and tantras, He cannot be brought under control through Mantras.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw XMqR dy vs ivc AwauWdw hY, nw qMqR Aqy mMqR dy kwbU huMdw hY।

transliteration.en: n ja(n)tr mai na ta(n)tr mai na ma(n)tr bas aaviee ||

verse.gurmukhi: purwn AO kurwn nyiq nyiq kY bqwveI ]

en.bdb: The Puranas and the Quran speak of Him as ‘Neti, Neti’ (infinite).

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) purwx Aqy kurwn byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn।

transliteration.en: puraan aau kuraan net net kai bataaviee ||

verse.gurmukhi: n krm mY n Drm mY n Brm mY bqweIAY ]

en.bdb: He cannot be told within any Karmas, religions and illusions.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw krm ivc, nw Drm ivc Aqy nw Brm ivc (lupq) disAw jwdw hY।

transliteration.en: n karam mai na dharam mai na bharam mai bataieeaai ||

verse.gurmukhi: AgMj Awid dyv hY kho su kYs pweIAY ]5]165]

en.bdb: The Primal Lord is Indestructible, say, how can He be realized? 5.165.

bdb.gurmukhi: nws qoN rihq auh Awid dyv nUM dso iks qrHw pwieAw jw skdw hY ]5]165]

transliteration.en: aga(n)j aadh dhev hai kaho su kais paieeaai ||5||165||

verse.gurmukhi: ijmI jmwn ky ibKY smsiq eyk joiq hY ]

en.bdb: Within all the earth and sky, there is only one Light.

bdb.gurmukhi: DrqI Aqy AwkwS ivc sB Qw (ijs dI) iek joiq (psrI hoeI) hY;

transliteration.en: jimee jamaan ke bikhai samasat ek jot hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n Gwit hY n bwiF hY n Gwit bwiF hoq hY ]

en.bdb: Which neither decreases nor increases in any being, It never decreases or increases.

bdb.gurmukhi: jo nw GtdI hY, nw v`DdI hY Aqy nw GtdI-vDdI dovyW hY;

transliteration.en: n ghaaT hai na baadd hai na ghaaT baadd hot hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n hwn hY n bwn hY smwn rUp jwnIAY ]

en.bdb: It is without decadence and without habit, it is known to have the same form.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh joiq) nw Gwty vwlI hY, nw bnwvt vwlI hY, (aus nUM) smwn rUp vwlw smJxw cwhIdw hY;

transliteration.en: n haan hai na baan hai samaan roop jaaneeaai ||

verse.gurmukhi: mkIn AO mkwn ApRmwn qyj mwnIAY ]6]166]

en.bdb: In all houses and places its unlimited brilliance is acknowledged. 6.166.

bdb.gurmukhi: aus nUM mkwnw Aqy mkwnw ivc vsx vwilAW ivc by-imswl pRkwS mMnxw cwhIdw hY ]6]166]

transliteration.en: makeen aau makaan apramaan tej maaneeaai ||6||166||

verse.gurmukhi: n dyh hY n gyh hY n jwiq hY n pwiq hY ]

en.bdb: He hath no body, no home, no caste and no lineage.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dw) nw SrIr hY, nw Gr hY, nw jwiq hY Aqy nw hI brwdrI;

transliteration.en: n dheh hai na geh hai na jaat hai na paat hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n mMqR hY n imqR hY n qwq hY n mwq hY ]

en.bdb: He hath no minister, no friend, no father and no mother.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dw) nw (koeI) slwhkwr hY, nw imqr hY, nw ipqw hY Aqy nw hI mwqw hY;

transliteration.en: n ma(n)tr hai na mitr hai na taat hai na maat hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n AMg hY n rMg hY n sMg swQ nyh hY ]

en.bdb: He hath no limb, no colour, and hath no affection for a companion.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dw) nw (koeI) AMg-swk hY, nw rMg hY, nw iksy sMgI-swQI dw snyh hY;

transliteration.en: n a(n)g hai na ra(n)g hai na sa(n)g saath neh hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n doK hY n dwg hY n dÍYK hY n dyh hY ]7]167]

en.bdb: He hath no blemish, no stain, no malice and no body.7.167.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw doS hY, nw klMk hY, nw dÍYS hY, nw dyh hY ]7]167]

transliteration.en: n dhokh hai na dhaag hai na dhavaikh hai na dheh hai ||7||167||

verse.gurmukhi: n isMG hY n sÎwr hY n rwau hY n rMk hY ]

en.bdb: He is neither a lion, nor a jackal, nor a king nor a poor.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw Syr hY, nw igdV hY, nw rwjw hY, nw iBKwrI hY;

transliteration.en: n si(n)gh hai na sayaar hai na raau hai na ra(n)k hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n mwn hY n mauq hY n swk hY n sMk hY ]

en.bdb: He egoless, deathless, kinless and doubtless.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw mwx hY, nw mOq, nw swk hY Aqy nw hI SMkw hY;

transliteration.en: n maan hai na maut hai na saak hai na sa(n)k hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n j`C hY n gMDRb hY n nru hY n nwr hY ]

en.bdb: He is neither a Yaksha, nor a Gandharva, nor a man nor a woman.

bdb.gurmukhi: nw XkS hY, nw gMDrb hY, nw nr hY Aqy nw hI nwrI hY;

transliteration.en: n ja'chh hai na ga(n)dhrab hai na nar hai na naar hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n cor hY n swhu hY n swh ko kumwr hY ]8]168]

en.bdb: He is neither a thief, nor a moneylender nor a prince.8.168.

bdb.gurmukhi: nw cor hY, nw Swh hY Aqy nw hI SwhUkwr dw pu`qr hY ]8]168]

transliteration.en: n chor hai na saahu hai na saeh ko kumaar hai ||8||168||

verse.gurmukhi: n nyh hY n gyh hY n dyh ko bnwau hY ]

en.bdb: He is without attachment, without home and without the formation of the body.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw moh hY, nw (aus dw) Gr hY, nw SrIr hY Aqy nw hI bnwvt hY;

transliteration.en: n neh hai na geh hai na dheh ko banaau hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n Cl hY n iC`dR hY n Cl ko imlwau hY ]

en.bdb: He is without deceit, without blemish and without the blend of deceit.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus ivc) nw (koeI) Cl hY, nw iCdR (sUrw^) hY, nw hI Cl nwl aus dw koeI myl hY;

transliteration.en: n chhal hai na chhi'dhr hai na chhal ko milaau hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n qMqR hY n mMqR hY n jMqR ko srUp hY ]

en.bdb: He is neither Tantra , nor a mantra nor the form of Yantra.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw qMqR hY, nw mMqR hY Aqy nw XMqR dw srUp hY;

transliteration.en: n ta(n)tr hai na ma(n)tr hai na ja(n)tr ko saroop hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n rwg hY n rMg hY n ryK hY n rUp hY ]9]169]

en.bdb: He is without affection, without colour, without form and without lineage. 9.169.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw moh hY, nw rMg hY, (aus dw) nw Awkwr hY Aqy nw hI (koeI) srUp hY ]9]169]

transliteration.en: n raag hai na ra(n)g hai na rekh hai na roop hai ||9||169||

verse.gurmukhi: n jMqR hY n mMqR hY n qMqR ko bnwau hY ]

en.bdb: He is neither a Yantra, nor a Mantra nor the formation of a Tantra.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw XMqR (dy vs) hY, nw mMqR Aqy nw qMqR duAwrw bixAw hY,

transliteration.en: n ja(n)tr hai na ma(n)tr hai na ta(n)tr ko banaau hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n Cl hY n iC`dR hY n CwieAw ko imlwau hY ]

en.bdb: He is without deceit, without blemish and without the blend of ignorance.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw Cl hY, nw iCdR (sUrw^) hY Aqy nw mwieAw ('CwieAw') nwl (aus dw) myl hY;

transliteration.en: n chhal hai na chhi'dhr hai na chhaiaa ko milaau hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n rwg hY n rMg hY n rUp hY n ryK hY ]

en.bdb: He is without affection, without colour, without form and without line.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw moh hY, nw rMg hY, nw rUp vwlw hY Aqy nw hI Awkwr vwlw hY;

transliteration.en: n raag hai na ra(n)g hai na roop hai na rekh hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n krm hY n Drm hY Ajnm hY AByK hY ]10]170]

en.bdb: He is actionless, religionless, birthless and guiseless. 10.170.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw krm hY, nw Drm hY, (auh) Ajnmw Aqy ByK qoN rihq hY ]10]170]

transliteration.en: n karam hai na dharam hai ajanam hai abhekh hai ||10||170||

verse.gurmukhi: n qwq hY n mwq hY AKÎwl AKMf rUp hY ]

en.bdb: He is without father, without nother, beyond thought and Indivisible Entity.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dw) nw ipqw hY, nw mwqw, (auh) iKAwl qoN au`cw AKMf rUp vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: n taat hai na maat hai akhayaal akha(n)dd roop hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: ACyd hY AByd hY n rMk hY n BUp hY ]

en.bdb: He is Invincible and Indiscriminate  He is neither a pauper nor a king.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) ACyd Aqy AByd hY, (auh) nw iBKwrI hY Aqy nw hI rwjw।

transliteration.en: achhedh hai abhedh hai na ra(n)k hai na bhoop hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: pry hY pivqR hY punIq hY purwn hY ]

en.bdb: He is in the Yond, He is Holy, Immaculate and Ancient.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh sB qoN) pry hY, pivqr hY, sv`C hY Aqy purwqn hY।

transliteration.en: pare hai pavitr hai puneet hai puraan hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: AgMj hY ABMj hY krIm hY kurwn hY ]11]171]

en.bdb: He is Indestructible, Invincible, Merciful and Holy like Quran. 11.171.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw nwS huMdw hY, nw tu`tdw hY, auh ikRpwlU hY, pivqr Drm-gRMQ (kurwn) hY ]11]171]

transliteration.en: aga(n)j hai abha(n)j hai kareem hai kuraan hai ||11||171||

verse.gurmukhi: Akwl hY Apwl hY iKAwl hY AKMf hY ]

en.bdb: He is Non-temporal, Patronless, a Concept and Indivisible.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) kwl-rihq, pwlxw-rihq hY, (auh) icMqn (dw inSwxw) hY Aqy AKMf srUp vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: akaal hai apaal hai khiaal hai akha(n)dd hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n rog hY n sog hY n Byd hY n BMf hY ]

en.bdb: He is without ailment, without sorrow, without contrast and without slander.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw rog hY, nw sog hY, nw rh`spUrn hY Aqy nw hI nSr kIqy jwx vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: n rog hai na sog hai na bhedh hai na bha(n)dd hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n AMg hY n rMg hY n sMg hY n swQ hY ]

en.bdb: He is limbless, colourless, comradeless and companionless.

bdb.gurmukhi: aus dw nw (koeI) AMg (SrIr) hY, nw rMg hY, nw (koeI) sMg-swQ hY।

transliteration.en: n a(n)g hai na ra(n)g hai na sa(n)g hai na saath hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: ipRAw hY pivqR hY punIq hY pRmwQ hY ]12]172]

en.bdb: He is Beloved, Sacred, Immaculate and the Subtle Truth. 12.172.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) ipAwrw hY, pivqr hY, sv`C hY Aqy (sB nUM) ADIn rKx vwlw hY ]12]172]

transliteration.en: priaa hai pavitr hai puneet hai pramaath hai ||12||172||

verse.gurmukhi: n sIq hY n sok hY n GRwm hY n Gwm hY ]

en.bdb: He neither chilly, nor sorrowful, nor shade nor sunshine.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw srdI hY, nw grmI hY, nw Cw hY Aqy nw Dup hY;

transliteration.en: n seet hai na sok hai na ghraam hai na ghaam hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n loB hY n moh hY n kRoD hY n kwm hY ]

en.bdb: He is without greed, without attachment, without anger and without lust.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw loB hY, nw moh hY, nw kRoD hY Aqy nw hI kwmnw hY।

transliteration.en: n lobh hai na moh hai na krodh hai na kaam hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n dyv hY n dYq hY n nr ko srUp hY ]

en.bdb: He is neither god nor demon nor in he form of a human being.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw dyvqw hY, nw dYNq hY Aqy nw purK srUp vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: n dhev hai na dhait hai na nar ko saroop hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n Cl hY n iCdR hY n iCdR kI ibBUiq hY ]13]173]

en.bdb: He is neither deceit nor blemish nor the substance of slander. 13.173.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus ivc) nw koeI Cl hY, nw iCdR hY Aqy nw hI nuksw vwlI ivBUqI (sMp`qI) hY ]13]173]

transliteration.en: n chhal hai na chhidhr hai na chhidhr kee bibhoot hai ||13||173||

verse.gurmukhi: n kwm hY n kRoD hY n loB hY n moh hY ]

en.bdb: He is without lust, anger, greed and attachment.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw kwm hY, nw kRoD hY, nw loB hY, nw moh hY,

transliteration.en: n kaam hai na krodh hai na lobh hai na moh hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n dÍYK hY n ByK hY n dueI hY n dRoh hY ]

en.bdb: He is without malice, garb, duality and deception.

bdb.gurmukhi: nw dÍYS hY, nw ByK hY, nw dUeI dw Bwv hY Aqy nw DoKw hY।

transliteration.en: n dhavaikh hai na bhekh hai na dhuiee hai na dhroh hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n kwl hY n bwl hY sdIv idAwl rUp hY ]

en.bdb: He is deathless, childless and always Merciful Entity.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw kwl hY, nw bwlk hY, sdw idAwlU rUp vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: n kaal hai na baal hai sadheev dhiaal roop hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: AgMj hY ABMj hY ABrm hY ABUq hY ]14]174]

en.bdb: He is Indestructible, Invincible, Illusionless and Elementless. 14.174.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) AgMj hY, ABMj hY, Brm Aqy pMj BUqw qoN au`cw hY ]14]174]

transliteration.en: aga(n)j hai abha(n)j hai abharam hai abhoot hai ||14||174||

verse.gurmukhi: ACyd Cyd hY sdw AgMj gMj gMj hY ]

en.bdb: He always assails the unassailable, He is the Destroyer of the Indestructible.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) sdw ACyd nUM vI Cydx vwlw hY Aqy nSt nw hox vwilAW dw vI nwSk hY।

transliteration.en: achhedh chhedh hai sadhaa aga(n)j ga(n)j ga(n)j hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: ABUq ByK hY blI ArUp rwg rMg hY ]

en.bdb: His Elementless Garb is Powerful, He is the Original Form of Sound and Colour.

bdb.gurmukhi: q`qÍw qoN ibnw vI auh blvwn srUp vwlw hY Aqy auh rwgrMg Aqy rUp-rihq hY।

transliteration.en: abhoot bhekh hai balee aroop raag ra(n)g hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n dÍYK hY n ByK hY n kwm kRoD krm hY ]

en.bdb: He is without malice, garb, lust anger and action.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus ivc) nw dÍYS hY, nw ByK hY Aqy nw hI kwm, kRoD Aqy krm hY।

transliteration.en: n dhavaikh hai na bhekh hai na kaam krodh karam hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n jwq hY n pwq hY n ic`qR ichn brn hY ]15]175]

en.bdb: He is without caste, lineage, picture, mark and colour.15.175.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dI) nw (koeI) jwiq hY, nw brwdrI hY Aqy nw hI (koeI) icqr, icMnH Aqy vrn hY ]15]175]

transliteration.en: n jaat hai na paat hai na chi'tr chihan baran hai ||15||175||

verse.gurmukhi: ibAMq hY AnMq hY AnMq qyj jwnIAY ]

en.bdb: He is Limitless, endless and be comprehended as consisting of endless Glory.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) byAMq hY, AnMq hY, (aus nUM) byAMq qyj vwlw jwxnw cwhIdw hY।

transliteration.en: bia(n)t hai ana(n)t hai ana(n)t tej jaaneeaai ||

verse.gurmukhi: ABUm AiB`j hY sdw AiC`j qyj mwnIAY ]

en.bdb: He is unearthly and unappeasable and be considered as consisting of unassailable Glory.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) ^wkI (pwriQv) nhIN hY, pRBwivq hox vwlw nhIN hY, (aus nUM) sdw nw iCJx vwlw qyj mMnxw cwhIdw hY।

transliteration.en: abhoom abhi'j hai sadhaa achhi'j tej maaneeaai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n AwD hY n ibAwD hY AgwD rUp lyKIAY ]

en.bdb: He is without the ailments of body and mind and be Known as the lord of Unfathomable form.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw mwnisk rog hY, nw SrIrk rog hY; (aus nUM) AgwD rUp vwlw igxnw cwhIdw hY।

transliteration.en: n aadh hai na biaadh hai agaadh roop lekheeaai ||

verse.gurmukhi: AdoK hY Adwg hY ACY pRqwp pyKIAY ]16]176]

en.bdb: He is Without blemish and stain and be visualised as consisting of Indestructible Glory .16.176

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) doK qoN ibnw hY, dwZ qoN rihq hY, (aus nUM) sdw nSt nw hox vwly pRqwp vwlw vyKxw cwhIdw hY ]16]176]

transliteration.en: adhokh hai adhaag hai achhai prataap pekheeaai ||16||176||

verse.gurmukhi: n krm hY n Brm hY n Drm ko pRBwau hY ]

en.bdb: He is beyond the impact of action, illusion and religion.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus ivc) nw krm hY, nw Brm hY; (aus auqy) nw Drm dw pRBwv hY।

transliteration.en: n karam hai na bharam hai na dharam ko prabhaau hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n jMqR hY n qMqR hY n mMqR ko rlwau hY ]

en.bdb: He is neither Yantra, nor Tantra nor a blend of slander.

bdb.gurmukhi: auh nw XMqRw ivc, nw qMqRw ivc Aqy nw hI mMqRw ivc rilAw hoieAw hY।

transliteration.en: n ja(n)tr hai na ta(n)tr hai na ma(n)tr ko ralaau hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n Cl hY n iCdR hY n iCdR ky srUp hY ]

en.bdb: He is neither deceit, nor malice nor a form of slander.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw Cl hY, nw iCdR hY Aqy nw hI iCdR (nuks) vwlw srUp rKdw hY।

transliteration.en: n chhal hai na chhidhr hai na chhidhr ke saroop hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: ABMg hY AnMg hY AgMj sI ibBUq hY ]17]177]

en.bdb: He is Indivisible, limbless and treasure of unending equipment.17.177.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nwS qoN ibnw, SrIr qoN ibnw Aqy nSt nw hox vwlI sMpdw hY ]17]177]

transliteration.en: abha(n)g hai ana(n)g hai aga(n)j see bibhoot hai ||17||177||

verse.gurmukhi: n kwm hY n kRoD hY n loB moh kwr hY ]

en.bdb: He is without the activity of lust, anger, greed and attachment.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) nw kwm hY, nw kRoD hY Aqy nw loB, moh Aqy hMkwr ('kwr') hY।

transliteration.en: n kaam hai na krodh hai na lobh moh kaar hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n AwD hY n gwD hY n ibAwD ko ibcwr hY ]

en.bdb: He, the Unfathomable Lord, is without the concepts of the ailments of the body and mind.

bdb.gurmukhi: auh nw AwiD hY, nw hI (iksy pRwpqI dI aus nUM) cwh ('gwD') hY Aqy nw hI ivAwiD dw ivcwr hY।

transliteration.en: n aadh hai na gaadh hai na biaadh ko bichaar hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n rMg rwg rUp hY n rUp ryK rwr hY ]

en.bdb: He is without affection for colour and form, He is without the dispute of beauty and line.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw rMg, rwg Aqy srUp vwlw hY, nw hI rUpryKw dI koeI rVk hY।

transliteration.en: n ra(n)g raag roop hai na roop rekh raar hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n hwau hY n Bwau hY n dwau ko pRkwr hY ]18]178]

en.bdb: He is without gesticulation and charm and any kind of deception. 18.178.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus ivc) nw hwv-Bwv hY Aqy nw hI dwau-pyc dw koeI FMg hY ]18]178]

transliteration.en: n haau hai na bhaau hai na dhaau ko prakaar hai ||18||178||

verse.gurmukhi: gjwDpI nrwDpI krMq syv hY sdw ]

en.bdb: Indra and Kuber are always at Thy service.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs dI) (AYrwvq dw suAwmI) ieMdr Aqy (nrw dw suAwmI) kubyr sdw syvw krdy hn;

transliteration.en: gajaadhapee naraadhapee kara(n)t sev hai sadhaa ||

verse.gurmukhi: isqsuqI qpspqI bnspqI jps sdw ]

en.bdb: The moon, sun and Varuna ever repeat Thy Name.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs dw) cMdRmw ('isqspqI') sUrj Aqy vrux sdw jp krdy hn,

transliteration.en: sitasutee tapasapatee banasapatee japas sadhaa ||

verse.gurmukhi: Agsq Awid jy bfy qpspqI ibsyKIAY ]

en.bdb: All the distinctive and great ascetics including Agastya etc

bdb.gurmukhi: Agsq Awid v`fy v`fy ivSyS qpsvI

transliteration.en: agasat aadh je badde tapasapatee bisekheeaai ||

verse.gurmukhi: ibAMq ibAMq ibAMq ko krMq pwT pyKIAY ]19]179]

en.bdb: See them reciting the Praises of the Infinite and Limitless Lord.19.179.

bdb.gurmukhi: (sB aus nUM) byAMq byAMq byAMq kihMdy vyKy gey hn ]19]179]

transliteration.en: bia(n)t bia(n)t bia(n)t ko kara(n)t paaTh pekheeaai ||19||179||

verse.gurmukhi: AgwD Awid dyvkI Anwd bwq mwnIAY ]

en.bdb: The discourse of that Profound and Primal Lord is without beginning.

bdb.gurmukhi: aus AgwD, Awid dyv dI g`l (ibRqwq) Anwid hY।

transliteration.en: agaadh aadh dhevakee anaadh baat maaneeaai ||

verse.gurmukhi: n jwq pwq mMqR im`qR s`qR snyh jwnIAY ]

en.bdb: He hath no caste, lineage, adviser, friend, enemy and love.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dI) nw jwiq hY, nw brwdrI hY, nw hI (aus dw koeI) slwhkwr, imqr, vYrI Aqy snyhI smJxw cwhIdw hY।

transliteration.en: n jaat paat ma(n)tr mi'tr sa'tr saneh jaaneeaai ||

verse.gurmukhi: sdIv srb lok ko ikRpwl iKAwl mY rhY ]

en.bdb: I may always remain absorbed in the Beneficent Lord of all the worlds.

bdb.gurmukhi: (jo ivAkqI) sdw sB lokw auqy ikRpwlU (prm s`qw) nUM Awpxy iDAwn ivc rKdy hn,

transliteration.en: sadheev sarab lok ko kirapaal khiaal mai rahai ||

verse.gurmukhi: qurMq dRoh dyh ky AnMq BWiq so dhY ]20]180]

en.bdb: That Lord removes immediately all the infinite agonies of the body. 20.180.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aunHw dI) dyh dy Anyk qrHw dy duK qurq hI sV jwdy hn ]20]180]

transliteration.en: tura(n)t dhroh dheh ke ana(n)t bhaa(n)t so dhahai ||20||180||

verse.gurmukhi: qÍ pRswid ] rUAwl CMd ]

en.bdb: BY THY GRACE. ROOALL STANZA

bdb.gurmukhi: qyrI ikRpw nwl: rUAwml CMd:

transliteration.en: tavai prasaadh || rooaal chha(n)dh ||

verse.gurmukhi: rUp rwg n ryK rMg n jnm mrn ibhIn ]

en.bdb: He is without form, affection, mark and colour and also without birth and death.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs dw) rUp, rwg, ryKw Aqy rMg nhIN hY Aqy (jo) jnm-mrn qoN rihq hY,

transliteration.en: roop raag na rekh ra(n)g na janam maran biheen ||

verse.gurmukhi: Awid nwQ AgwD purK su Drm krm pRbIn ]

en.bdb: He is the Primal Master, Unfathomable and All-Pervading Lord and also adept in pious actions.

bdb.gurmukhi: (jo) mu`F-kdIm dw sB dw suAwmI, AgwD purK hY Aqy Drm krm ivc pRbIn hY;

transliteration.en: aadh naath agaadh purakh su dharam karam prabeen ||

verse.gurmukhi: jMqR mMqR n qMqR jw ko Awid purK Apwr ]

en.bdb: He is the Primal and Infinite Purusha without any Yantra, Mantra and Tantra.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs nUM) XMqR, mMqR Aqy qMqR Awid (vs ivc nhIN) kr skdy Aqy jo Awid purK Aqy Apwr hY;

transliteration.en: ja(n)tr ma(n)tr na ta(n)tr jaa ko aadh purakh apaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: hsq kIt ibKY bsY sB Taur mY inrDwr ]1]181]

en.bdb: He abides in both the elephant and the ant, and be considered living at all the places. 1.181.

bdb.gurmukhi: (jo) hwQI qoN lY ky kIVy qk ivc vsdw hY Aqy jo swrIAW Qwvw ivc ibnw iksy AwDwr dy mOjUd hY ]1]181]

transliteration.en: hasat keeT bikhai basai sabh Thaur mai niradhaar ||1||181||

verse.gurmukhi: jwiq pwiq n qwq jw ko mMqR mwq n im`qR ]

en.bdb: He is without caste, lineage, father, mother, adviser and friend.

bdb.gurmukhi: ijs dI (koeI) jwiq, brwdrI, ipqw, mwqw, slwhkwr Aqy imqr nhIN hY;

transliteration.en: jaat paat na taat jaa ko ma(n)tr maat na mi'tr ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb Taur ibKY rimE ijh ckR ichn n icqR ]

en.bdb: He is All-Pervading, and without mark, sign and picture.

bdb.gurmukhi: jo sB Qwvw ivc rmx kr irhw hY Aqy ijs dw koeI icMnH-c`kr Aqy srUp ('icqR') nhIN hY;

transliteration.en: sarab Thaur bikhai ramio jeh chakr chihan na chitr ||

verse.gurmukhi: Awid dyv audwr mUriq AgwD nwQ AnMq ]

en.bdb: He is the Primal Lord, beneficent Entity, Unfathomable and Infinite Lord.

bdb.gurmukhi: (jo) Awid-dyv, audwr suBw vwlw, AgwD Aqy AnMq suAwmI hY;

transliteration.en: aadh dhev udhaar moorat agaadh naath ana(n)t ||

verse.gurmukhi: Awid AMiq n jwnIAY AibKwd dyv durMq ]2]182]

en.bdb: His Beginning and End are unknown and He is far away from conflicts.2.182.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs dy) Awid Aqy AMq dw pqw nhIN (Aqy jo) bKyiVAW qoN mukq Aqy byAMq ieSt-dyv hY ]2]182]

transliteration.en: aadh a(n)t na jaaneeaai abikhaadh dhev dhura(n)t ||2||182||

verse.gurmukhi: dyv Byv n jwnhI ijh mrm byd kqyb ]

en.bdb: His secrets are not known to gods and also the Vedas and Semitic texts.

bdb.gurmukhi: ijs dw Byd dyvqy nhIN jwxdy Aqy (n hI aus dw) rh`s vyd Aqy kqyb pw sky hn।

transliteration.en: dhev bhev na jaanahee jeh maram bedh kateb ||

verse.gurmukhi: snk AO snkys nMdn pwvhI n hsyb ]

en.bdb: Sanak, Sanandan etc  the Sons of Brahma could not know His secret in spite of their service.

bdb.gurmukhi: bRhmw ('snkys') snk, Awid syvw kr ky ijs dw Anumwn nhIN lgw sky।

transliteration.en: sanak aau sanakes na(n)dhan paavahee na haseb ||

verse.gurmukhi: j`C ikMnr m`C mwns murg aurg Apwr ]

en.bdb: Also Yakshas, Kinnars, fishes, men and many beings and serpents of the nether-world.

bdb.gurmukhi: XkS, ikMnr, m`C, mnu`K, pMCI ('murg') s`p (Awid aus dy Byd nUM nhIN pw sky)

transliteration.en: ja'chh ki(n)nar ma'chh maanas murag urag apaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: nyiq nyiq pukwr hI isv skR AO muKcwr ]3]183]

en.bdb: The gods Shiva, Indra and Brahma repeat ‘Neti, Neti’ about Him.3.183.

bdb.gurmukhi: iSv, ieMdr ('skR') bRhmw (ijs nUM) byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn ]3]183]

transliteration.en: net net pukaar hee siv sakr aau mukhachaar ||3||183||

verse.gurmukhi: srb spq pqwr ky qr jwp hI ijh jwp ]

en.bdb: All the beings of the seven nether-worlds down below repeats His Name.

bdb.gurmukhi: swry s`qw pwqwlw dy hyTw ijs dw jwp jipAw jwdw hY,

transliteration.en: sarab sapat pataar ke tar jaap hee jeh jaap ||

verse.gurmukhi: Awid dyv AgwiD qyj Anwd mUriq Aqwp ]

en.bdb: He is the Primal Lord of Unfathomable Glory, the Beginningless and Anguishless Entity.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) Awid dyv AgwD qyj vwlw, Anwid srUp vwlw Aqy duKw qoN rihq hY,

transliteration.en: aadh dhev agaadh tej anaadh moorat ataap ||

verse.gurmukhi: jMqR mMqR n AwveI kr qMqR mMqR n kIn ]

en.bdb: He cannot be overpowered by Yantras and Mantras, He never yielded before Tantras and Mantras.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) XMqR, mMqR nwl h`Q nhIN AwauWdw, qMqR-mMqR nwl vs nhIN kIqw jw skdw।

transliteration.en: ja(n)tr ma(n)tr na aaviee kar ta(n)tr ma(n)tr na keen ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb Taur rihE ibrwj iDrwj rwj pRbIn ]4]184]

en.bdb: That superb Sovereign is All-Pervading and Scans all.4.184.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) sB dw suAwmI swry sQwnw ivc pRbInqw-pUrvk ibrwjmwn hY ]4]184]

transliteration.en: sarab Thaur rahio biraaj dhiraaj raaj prabeen ||4||184||

verse.gurmukhi: j`C gMDRb dyv dwno n bRhm C`qRIAn mwih ]

en.bdb: He is neither in Yakshas, Gandharvas, gods and demons, nor in Brahmins and Kshatriyas.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) XkSw, gMDrbw, dyviqAW, dYNqw, bRwhmxw, CqRIAW ivc nhIN hY;

transliteration.en: ja'chh ga(n)dhrab dhev dhaano na braham chha'treean maeh ||

verse.gurmukhi: bYsnM ky ibKY ibrwjY sUdR BI vh nwih ]

en.bdb: He is neither in Vaishnavas nor in Shudras.

bdb.gurmukhi: auh vYSxvw Aqy SUdrw ivc vI nhIN ibrwjdw।

transliteration.en: baisana(n) ke bikhai biraajai soodhr bhee veh naeh ||

verse.gurmukhi: gUV gauf n BIl BIkr bRhm syK srUp ]

en.bdb: He is neither in Rajputs, Gaurs and Bhils, nor in Brahmins and Sheikths.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) nw gMBIr gOV, iBAwnk BIl Aqy bRwhmx qy SyK dy srUp ivc hY।

transliteration.en: gooR gaudd na bheel bheekar braham sekh saroop ||

verse.gurmukhi: rwiq idvs n m`D aurD n BUm Akws AnUp ]5]185]

en.bdb: He is neither within night and day  He, the Unique Lord is also not within earth, sky and nether-world.5.185.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) AnUpm nw rwq idn ivc hY Aqy nw hI pwqwl, DrqI Aqy AwkwS ivc hY ]5]185]

transliteration.en: raat dhivas na ma'dh uradh na bhoom akaas anoop ||5||185||

verse.gurmukhi: jwiq jnm n kwl krm n Drm krm ibhIn ]

en.bdb: He is without caste, birth, death and action and also without the impact of religious rituals.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs dI) nw jwiq hY, nw jnm hY, nw imRqU hY, nw krm hY Aqy (jo) nw Drm-krm qoN rihq hY।

transliteration.en: jaat janam na kaal karam na dharam karam biheen ||

verse.gurmukhi: qIrQ jwqR n dyv pUjw gor ky n ADIn ]

en.bdb: He is beyond the impact of pilgrimage, worship of deities and the sacrament of creation.

bdb.gurmukhi: (jo) qIrQ-XwqRw, dyv-pUjw Aqy mVHI-mswxw dI pUjw dy ADIn vI nhIN hY,

transliteration.en: teerath jaatr na dhev poojaa gor ke na adheen ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb spq pqwr ky qr jwnIAY ijh joq ]

en.bdb: His Light Pervades in all the beings of the seven nether-worlds down below.

bdb.gurmukhi: ijs dI joiq swry s`qw pwqwlw dy hyTw jwxI jwdI hY।

transliteration.en: sarab sapat pataar ke tar jaaneeaai jeh jot ||

verse.gurmukhi: sys nwm shMsR Pn nih nyq pUrn hoq ]6]186]

en.bdb: The Sheshananga with his thousand hoods repeats His Names, but still short of his efforts.6.186.

bdb.gurmukhi: hzwr Pnw vwlw SySnwg vI inq nvyW nwvw nwl (aus dy) swry nw ismr nhIN sikAw hY ]6]186]

transliteration.en: ses naam saha(n)sr fan neh net pooran hot ||6||186||

verse.gurmukhi: soiD soiD hty sBY sur ibroD dwnv srb ]

en.bdb: All the gods and demons have grown tired in His search.

bdb.gurmukhi: swry dyvqy (aus nUM) lB lB ky Qk gey hn Aqy swry dYNq ivroD kr kr ky (hwr gey hn)।

transliteration.en: sodh sodh haTe sabhai sur birodh dhaanav sarab ||

verse.gurmukhi: gwie gwie hty gMDRb gvwie ikMnr grb ]

en.bdb: The ego of Gandharvas and Kinnars has been shattered by singing His Praises continuously.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus nUM) gwauWdy gwauWdy gMDrb Qk gey hn Aqy ikMnr (vI vwjy vjw vjw ky) Awpxw gOrv gMvw cuky hn।

transliteration.en: gai gai haTe ga(n)dhrab gavai ki(n)nar garab ||

verse.gurmukhi: pVHq pVHq Qky mhw kib gVHq gwVH AnMq ]

en.bdb: The great poets have become weary of reading and composing their innumerable epics.

bdb.gurmukhi: mhw kvI vI AnMq kwiv rc ky Aqy aunHw nUM pVH pVH ky Qk gey hn।

transliteration.en: paRhat paRhat thake mahaa kab gaRhat gaaRh ana(n)t ||

verse.gurmukhi: hwir hwir kihE sBU imil nwm nwm durMq ]7]187]

en.bdb: All have ultimately declared that the meditation on the Name of the Lord is a very hard task. 7.187.

bdb.gurmukhi: (pr) hwr ky sB ies nqIjy auqy phuMcy hn ik (aus prmwqmw dy swry) nwvw dw AMq pw skxw bhuq AOKw hY ]7]187]

transliteration.en: haar haar kahio sabhoo mil naam naam dhura(n)t ||7||187||

verse.gurmukhi: byd Byd n pwieE liKE n syb kqyb ]

en.bdb: The Vedas have not been able to know His mystery and the Semitic Scriptures could not comprehend His service.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dw) vydw ny Byd nhIN pwieAw Aqy nw kqybw ny (aus) syvw krn Xog dw AMq vyiKAw hY।

transliteration.en: bedh bhedh na paio lakhio na seb kateb ||

verse.gurmukhi: dyv dwno mUV mwno jC n jwnY jyb ]

en.bdb: The gods, demons and men are foolish and the Yakshas do not know His Glory.

bdb.gurmukhi: ijs dI Skl ('jyb') nUM XkS nhIN jwx sky Aqy dyvqy Aqy dYNq mwno (jwxn dw Xqn krdy krdy) mUrK is`D ho gey hox।

transliteration.en: dhev dhaano mooR maano jachh na jaanai jeb ||

verse.gurmukhi: BUq B`b Bvwn BUpq Awid nwQ AnwQ ]

en.bdb: He is the king of past, present and future and Primal Master of the Masterless.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh pRBU) BUq, BivK Aqy vrqmwn dw rwjw hY Aqy Awid nwQ Aqy nwS qoN rihq hY।

transliteration.en: bhoot bha'b bhavaan bhoopat aadh naath anaath ||

verse.gurmukhi: Agin bwie jly Qly mih srb Taur invws ]8]188]

en.bdb: He abides at all the places including fire, air, water and earth.8.188.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dw) AgnI, vwXU, jl, Ql Awid sBnw sQwnw ivc vwsw hY ]8]188]

transliteration.en: agan bai jale thale meh sarab Thaur nivaas ||8||188||

verse.gurmukhi: dyh gyh n nyh snyh Abyh nwQ AjIq ]

en.bdb: He hath no affection for body or love for home, He is Invincible and Unconquerable Lord.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs dw) SrIr Aqy Gr nwl snyh nhIN hY Aqy jo Aijq Aqy nw ivMnHy jw skx vwlw suAwmI hY।

transliteration.en: dheh geh na neh saneh abeh naath ajeet ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb gMjn srb BMjn srb qy AnBIq ]

en.bdb: He is Destroyer and defacer of all, He is without malice and Merciful to all.

bdb.gurmukhi: (jo) sB nUM nSt krn vwlw, sB nUM qoVn vwlw Aqy sB dy fr qoN rihq hY।

transliteration.en: sarab ga(n)jan sarab bha(n)jan sarab te anabheet ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb krqw srb hrqw srb dÎwl AdÍyK ]

en.bdb: He is Creator and Destroyer of all, He is without malice and Merciful to all.

bdb.gurmukhi: (jo) sB dw krqw, sB dw nwSk, sB auqy idAwlU Aqy AdÍYS hY।

transliteration.en: sarab karataa sarab harataa sarab dhayaal adhavaiekh ||

verse.gurmukhi: c`kR ichn n brn jw ko jwiq pwiq n ByK ]9]189]

en.bdb: He is without mark, sign, and colour  He is without caste, linege and guise.9.189.

bdb.gurmukhi: ijs dw c`kr, icMnH Aqy vrn nhIN, nw hI (koeI) jwiq, brwdrI Aqy ByK hY ]9]189]

transliteration.en: cha'kr chihan na baran jaa ko jaat paat na bhekh ||9||189||

verse.gurmukhi: rUp ryK n rMg jw ko rwg rUp n rMg ]

en.bdb: He is without form, line and colour, and hath no affection for sond and beauty.

bdb.gurmukhi: ijs dw rUp, ryK Aqy rMg nhIN hY Aqy nw hI rwg-rMg Aqy rUp hY।

transliteration.en: roop rekh na ra(n)g jaa ko raag roop na ra(n)g ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb lwiek srb Gwiek srb qy AnBMg ]

en.bdb: He is capable to do everything, He is the Destroyer of all and cannot be vanquished by anyone.

bdb.gurmukhi: (jo) sB kuJ krn dy smrQ Aqy sB dw sMGwrk Aqy Aijq hY।

transliteration.en: sarab laik sarab ghaik sarab te anabha(n)g ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb dwqw srb gÎwqw srb ko pRiqpwl ]

en.bdb: He is the Donor, Knower and Sustainer of all.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) sB dw dwqw, sB nUM jwxn vwlw Aqy sB dI pwlnw krn vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: sarab dhaataa sarab gayaataa sarab ko pratipaal ||

verse.gurmukhi: dIn bMDu dXwl suAwmI Awid dyv Apwl ]10]190]

en.bdb: He is the friend of the poor, He is the beneficent Lord and patronless Primal Deity.10.190.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh sB) dInw dw bMDU, idAwlU suBw vwlw suAwmI Aqy iksy dI pwlnw qoN rihq Awid dyv hY ]10]190]

transliteration.en: dheen ba(n)dh dhayaal suaamee aadh dhev apaal ||10||190||

verse.gurmukhi: dIn bMDu pRbIn sRI piq srb ko krqwr ]

en.bdb: He, the adept Lord of maya, is the friend of the lowly and Creator of all.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) prmwqmw dInw dw bMDU, pRbIn, mwieAw dw pqI Aqy sB dw krqw hY;

transliteration.en: dheen ba(n)dh prabeen sree pat sarab ko karataar ||

verse.gurmukhi: brn ichn n c`kR jw ko c`kR ichn Akwr ]

en.bdb: He is without colour, mark and sign  He is without mark, sing and form.

bdb.gurmukhi: ijs dw (koeI) vrn, icMnH-c`kr, muhwdrw Aqy SrIr nhIN hY;

transliteration.en: baran chihan na cha'kr jaa ko cha'kr chihan akaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: jwiq pwiq n goqR gwQw rUp ryK n brn ]

en.bdb: He is without caste , lineage and story of descent  He is without form, line and colour.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs dI) jwiq brwdrI, goq dI (koeI) gwQw nhIN hY Aqy nw hI (koeI) rUp ryKw jw vrn hY;

transliteration.en: jaat paat na gotr gaathaa roop rekh na baran ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb dwqw srb gXwqw srb BUA ko Brn ]11]191]

en.bdb: He is the Donor and Knower of all and the Sustainer of all the universe. 11.191.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) sB nUM dyx vwlw, sB nUM jwxn vwlw Aqy swrI BUmI dw pwlx poSx krn vwlw hY ]11]191]

transliteration.en: sarab dhaataa sarab gayaataa sarab bhooa ko bharan ||11||191||

verse.gurmukhi: dust gMjn s`qR BMjn prm purK pRmwQ ]

en.bdb: He is the Destroyer of the tyrants and vanquisher of the enemies, and the Omnipotent Supreme Purusha.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) duStw nUM mwrn vwlw, duSmxw nUM nSt krn vwlw Aqy (sMswr dy smrQwvwnw nUM) kuclx vwlw prm purK hY।

transliteration.en: dhusaT ga(n)jan sa'tr bha(n)jan param purakh pramaath ||

verse.gurmukhi: dust hrqw isRst krqw jgq mY ijh gwQ ]

en.bdb: He is Vanquisher of the tyrants and the Creator of the universe, and His Story is being narrated in the whole world.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) duStw nUM mwrn vwlw, isRStI dw krqw hY Aqy ijs dI kQw jgq ivc pRis`D hY।

transliteration.en: dhusaT harataa sirasaT karataa jagat mai jeh gaath ||

verse.gurmukhi: BUq Bib Biv`K Bvwn pRmwn dyv AgMj ]

en.bdb: He, the Invincible Lord, is the same in the Past, Present and Future.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) AnSvr prm-s`qw BUq, BivK Aqy vrqmwn (iqMnw kwlw) qk mOjUd hY।

transliteration.en: bhoot bhab bhavi'kh bhavaan pramaan dhev aga(n)j ||

verse.gurmukhi: Awid AMq Anwid sRI piq prm purK ABMj ]12]192]

en.bdb: He, the Lord of maya, the Immortal and unassailable Supreme Purusha, was there in the beginning and will be there at the end.12.192.

bdb.gurmukhi: Aqy (auh) Awid qoN AMq qk Anwid, mwieAw dw pqI, nwS qoN rihq prm purS hY ]12]192]

transliteration.en: aadh a(n)t anaadh sree pat param purakh abha(n)j ||12||192||

verse.gurmukhi: Drm ky Ankrm jyqk kIn qaun pswr ]

en.bdb: He hath spread all the other religious practices.

bdb.gurmukhi: Drm Aqy Drm nwl sMbMiDq hor ijqny krm hn, aunHw dw pswrw (ausy ny) kIqw hY;

transliteration.en: dharam ke anakaram jetak keen taun pasaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: dyv Adyv gMDRb ikMnr m`C k`C Apwr ]

en.bdb: He hath Created innumerable gods, demons, Gandharvas, Kinnars, fish incarnations and tortoise incarnations.

bdb.gurmukhi: Apwr dyviqAW, dYNqw, gMdrbw, ikMnrw, m`Cw, k`Cw Awid (dw rcYqw vI auhI hY)।

transliteration.en: dhev adhev ga(n)dhrab ki(n)nar ma'chh ka'chh apaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: BUm Akws jly Qly mih mwnIAY ijh nwm ]

en.bdb: His Name is reverently repeated by the beings on earth, in sky, in water and on land.

bdb.gurmukhi: BUmI, AwkwS, jl Ql ivc ijs dy nwm dI mihmw hY।

transliteration.en: bhoom akaas jale thale meh maaneeaai jeh naam ||

verse.gurmukhi: dust hrqw pust krqw isRsit hrqw kwm ]13]193]

en.bdb: His works include the decimation of tyrants, giving of strength (to the saints) and support to the world.13.193.

bdb.gurmukhi: duStw nUM mwrnw, (swDU purSw nUM) idRVH krnw Aqy isRStI dw nwS krnw (aus dw) kMm hY ]13]193]

transliteration.en: dhusaT harataa pusaT karataa sirasaT harataa kaam ||13||193||

verse.gurmukhi: dust hrnw isRst krnw idAwl lwl goibMd ]

en.bdb: The Beloved Merciful Lord is the Vanquisher of the tyrants and the Creator of the Universe.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) duStw dw nwSk, isRStI dw krqw, idAwlU Aqy ipAwrw goibMd hY।

transliteration.en: dhusaT haranaa sirasaT karanaa dhiaal laal gobi(n)dh ||

verse.gurmukhi: im`qR pwlk s`qR Gwlk dIn dÎwl mukMd ]

en.bdb: He is the Sustainer of the friends and the slayer of the enemies.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) imqrw dI pwlnw krn vwlw, vYrIAW nUM nSt krn vwlw, dInidAwl Aqy mukqIdwqw hY।

transliteration.en: mi'tr paalak sa'tr ghaalak dheen dhayaal muka(n)dh ||

verse.gurmukhi: AGO dMfx dust KMfx kwl hUM ky kwl ]

en.bdb: He, the Merciful Lord of the lowely, He is the punisher of the sinners and destroyer of the tyrants  He is the decimater even of death.

bdb.gurmukhi: pwpIAW nUM dMf dyx vwlw, duStw nUM cUr cUr krn vwlw Aqy kwl dw vI kwl hY।

transliteration.en: aghau dha(n)ddan dhusaT kha(n)ddan kaal hoo(n) ke kaal ||

verse.gurmukhi: dust hrxM pust krxM srb ky pRiqpwl ]14]194]

en.bdb: He is the Vanquisher of the tyrants, giver of strength (to the saints) and the Sustainer of all.14.194.

bdb.gurmukhi: duStw dw dmn krn vwlw, (Bly purSw nUM) puSt krn vwlw Aqy sB dw pRiqpwlk hY ]14]194]

transliteration.en: dhusaT harana(n) pusaT karana(n) sarab ke pratipaal ||14||194||

verse.gurmukhi: srb krqw srb hrqw srb qy Ankwm ]

en.bdb: He is the Creator and Destroyer of all and the fulfiller of the desires of all.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) sB dw krqw, sB dw nwSk Aqy sB dIAW kwmnwvw (pUrIAW krn vwlw hY)।

transliteration.en: sarab karataa sarab harataa sarab te anakaam ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb KMfx srb dMfx srb ky inj Bwm ]

en.bdb: He is the Destroyer and Punisher of all and also their personal Abode.

bdb.gurmukhi: sB dw KMfn krn vwlw, sB nUM dMf dyx vwlw Aqy sB dw injI pRkwS ('Bwm') hY (ArQwq sB ivc aus dI joiq mOjUd hY)।

transliteration.en: sarab kha(n)ddan sarab dha(n)ddan sarab ke nij bhaam ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb Bugqw srb jugqw srb krm pRbIn ]

en.bdb: He is the enjoyer of all and is united with all, He is also an adept in all karmas ( actions)

bdb.gurmukhi: sB nUM Bogx vwlw, swrIAW jugqw Aqy krmw ivc pRbIn hY।

transliteration.en: sarab bhugataa sarab jugataa sarab karam prabeen ||

verse.gurmukhi: srb KMfx srb dMfx srb krm ADIn ]15]195]

en.bdb: He is the Destroyer and Punisher of all and keeps all the works under His control.15.195.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) sB dw nwSk, sB dw dMfk hY Aqy swry krm (aus dy) ADIn hn ]15]195]

transliteration.en: sarab kha(n)ddan sarab dha(n)ddan sarab karam adheen ||15||195||

verse.gurmukhi: srb isMimRqn srb swsqRn srb byd ibcwr ]

en.bdb: He is not within the contemplation of all the Smritis, all the Shastras and all the Vedas.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auhI) swrIAW simRqIAW, swry SwsqRw Aqy swry vydw dw (smu`cw) ivcwr hY।

transliteration.en: sarab si(n)mritan sarab saasatran sarab bedh bichaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: dust hrqw ibsÍ Brqw Awid rUp Apwr ]

en.bdb: He, the Infinite Primal Entity is the Vanquisher of the tyrants and the Sustainer of the universe.

bdb.gurmukhi: duStw nUM mwrn vwlw, jgq dI pwlnw krn vwlw Aqy Apwr Awid rUp vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: dhusaT harataa bisavai bharataa aadh roop apaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: dust dMfx pust KMfx Awid dyv AKMf ]

en.bdb: He, the Primal Indivisible Lord is the punisher of the tyrants and breaker of the ego of the mighty.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) duStw nUM dMf dyx vwlw Aqy blvwnw (puStw) dw sMGwrk AKMf Awid dyv hY।

transliteration.en: dhusaT dha(n)ddan pusaT kha(n)ddan aadh dhev akha(n)dd ||

verse.gurmukhi: BUm Akws jly Qly mih jpq jwp AmMf ]16]196]

en.bdb: The name of that Uninstalled Lord is being repeated by the beings of earth, sky, water and land.16.196.

bdb.gurmukhi: DrqI, AwkwS, jl, Ql ivc ^ud sQwipq hox vwly ('AmMf') dw jwp jipAw jw irhw hY ]16]196]

transliteration.en: bhoom akaas jale thale meh japat jaap ama(n)dd ||16||196||

verse.gurmukhi: isRstwcwr ibcwr jyqy jwnIAY sbcwr ]

en.bdb: All the pious thoughts of the world known through the medium of knowledge.

bdb.gurmukhi: ijqny vI iSStwcwr Aqy ivcwr hn, ivcwr pUrvk smJ leIey ik (auh swry ausy ivc siQq hn)।

transliteration.en: sirasaTaachaar bichaar jete jaaneeaai sabachaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: Awid dyv Apwr sRI piq dust pust pRhwr ]

en.bdb: They are all within that Infinite Primal Lord of maya, the Destroyer of mighty tyrants.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) Awid dyv, Apwr, mwieAw dw pqI Aqy blvwn duStw nUM mwrn vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: aadh dhev apaar sree pat dhusaT pusaT prahaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: AMn dwqw igAwn igAwqw srb mwn mihMdR ]

en.bdb: He is the Donor of Sustenance, the Knower of Knowledge and the Sovereign revered by all.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) AMn-dwqw, igAwn krwaux vwlw Aqy swirAW rwijAW dw mwx hY।

transliteration.en: a(n)n dhaataa giaan giaataa sarab maan mahi(n)dhr ||

verse.gurmukhi: byd ibAws kry keI idn koit ieMdR auipMdR ]17]197]

en.bdb: He hath Created many Ved Vyas and millions of Indras and other gods.17.197.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus ny) ikqny hI vyd-ivAws, kroVw ieMdr Aqy aupyWdr (bwvn Avqwr) bxwey hn ]17]197]

transliteration.en: bedh biaas kare kiee dhin koT i(n)dhr upi(n)dhr ||17||197||

verse.gurmukhi: jnm jwqw krm igAwqw Drm cwr ibcwr ]

en.bdb: He is the cause of birth and knower of actions and notions of beauteous religious discipline.

bdb.gurmukhi: (auh) jnm-jnmwqrw dI g`l jwxn vwlw, krm-kwfw dw igAwqw Aqy Drm dw cMgw ivcwrk hY।

transliteration.en: janam jaataa karam giaataa dharam chaar bichaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: byd Byv n pwveI isv rudR AOr muKcwr ]

en.bdb: But the Vedas, Shiva, Rudra and Brahma could not Know His mystery and the secret of His notions.

bdb.gurmukhi: (ijs dw) vyd, iSv, rudR Aqy bRhmw rh`s nhIN jwx sky,

transliteration.en: bedh bhev na paaviee siv rudhr aauar mukhachaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: koit ieMdR auipMdR ibAws snk snq kumwr ]

en.bdb: Milions of Indras and other subordinate gods, Vyas, Sanak and Sanat Kumar.

bdb.gurmukhi: kroVw ieMdr, aupyWdr (bwvn Avqwr) ivAws, snk-sMq kumwr Awid sB

transliteration.en: koT i(n)dhr upi(n)dhr biaas sanak sanat kumaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: gwie gwie Qky sBY gun c`kRq By muKcwr ]18]198]

en.bdb: They and Brahma have got tired of singing His Praises in state of astonishment.18.198.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus dy) gux gw gw ky Qk gey hn Aqy bRhmw hYrwn ho igAw hY ]18]198]

transliteration.en: gai gai thake sabhai gun cha'krat bhe mukhachaar ||18||198||

verse.gurmukhi: Awid AMq n mD jw ko BUq B`b Bvwn ]

en.bdb: He is devoid of beginning, middle and end and also of past, present and future.

bdb.gurmukhi: (aus) dw Awid, AMq Aqy m`D Aqy BUq, BivK Aqy vrqmwn (kuJ vI nhIN hY)

transliteration.en: aadh a(n)t na madh jaa ko bhoot bha'b bhavaan ||

verse.gurmukhi: siq duAwpr iqRqIAw kiljug cqR kwl pRDwn ]

en.bdb: He is Supremely Pervasive in the four ages of Satyuga, Treta, Dvapara and Kaliyuga.

bdb.gurmukhi: auh sqXug, duAwpr, qRyqw Aqy kilXug cOhw kwlw ivc pRDwn hY।

transliteration.en: sat dhuaapar tirateeaa kalijug chatr kaal pradhaan ||

verse.gurmukhi: iDAwie iDAwie Qky mhw muin gwie gMDRb Apwr ]

en.bdb: The great sages have got tired of meditating upon Him and also Infinite Gandharvas singing His Praises continuously.

bdb.gurmukhi: aus nUM mhw munI AwrwDdy AwrwDdy Qk gey hn Aqy Apwr gMDrb gw gw ky hwr gey hn।

transliteration.en: dhiaai dhiaai thake mahaa mun gai ga(n)dhrab apaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: hwir hwir Qky sBY nhIN pweIAY iqh pwr ]19]199]

en.bdb: All have gone weary and accepted defeat, but none could know His end.19.199.

bdb.gurmukhi: sB hwr hwr ky Qk gey hn pr koeI vI aus dw pwr nhIN pw sikAw ]19]199]

transliteration.en: haar haar thake sabhai nahee(n) paieeaai teh paar ||19||199||

verse.gurmukhi: nwrd Awidk byd ibAwsk muin mhwn AnMq ]

en.bdb: The sage Narada and other, Ved Vyas and other and innumerable great sages

bdb.gurmukhi: nwrd, vyd-ivAws Awid byAMq mhwn munI

transliteration.en: naaradh aadhik bedh biaasak mun mahaan ana(n)t ||

verse.gurmukhi: iDAwie iDAwie Qky sBY kr koit kst durMq ]

en.bdb: Practising millions of arduous hardships and meditations all have got tired.

bdb.gurmukhi: kroVw kSt pUrn AOKy Xqn vwlI (aus dI) AwrwDnw krdy krdy Qk gey hn;

transliteration.en: dhiaai dhiaai thake sabhai kar koT kasaT dhura(n)t ||

verse.gurmukhi: gwie gwie Qky gMDRb nwc Ap`Cr Apwr ]

en.bdb: Gandharvas have got tired by singing and countless Apsaras (heavenly damsels) by dancing.

bdb.gurmukhi: gw gw ky gMDrb Qk gey hn Aqy byAMq Ap`Crwvw vI nc nc ky (Qk geIAW hn)

transliteration.en: gai gai thake ga(n)dhrab naach apa'chhar apaar ||

verse.gurmukhi: soiD soiD Qky mhw sur pwieE nih pwr ]20]200]

en.bdb: The great gods have got tired in their continuous search, but they could not know His end.20.200.

bdb.gurmukhi: pRDwn dyvqy (aus nUM) lB lB ky Qk gey hn, (pr aus dw) pwr nhIN pw sky ]20]200]

transliteration.en: dhoharaa || kavan risaT ko pusaT hai kahaa sirasaT ko chaar ||

transliteration.en: dhoharaa || ko sooraa su(n)dhar kavan kahaa jog ko saar ||

verse.gurmukhi: durjn dl dMfx Asur ibhMfx dust inkMdix Awid ibRqy ]

transliteration.en: la(n)kuReeaa faadhai aayudh baa(n)dhai sain bimaradhan kaal asura(n) ||

transliteration.en: jai jai hosee mahikhaasur maradhan ra(n)m kaparadhan dhait jina(n) ||3||213||

bdb.gurmukhi: qIrw dw mINh vswaux vwlI, duStw nUM GsIt GsIt ky mwrn vwlI, blvwn XoiDAW nUM pRsMn krn vwlI Aqy duStw nUM imDx vwlI,

bdb.gurmukhi: dYNqw dw lhU pIx vwlI, Xu`D ivc auqswh vDwaux vwlI, zwlmw nUM Kw jwx vwlI, Dwrimk ibrqI vwlI,

bdb.gurmukhi: lhU pIx vwlI, AgnI auglx vwlI, Xog-mwieAw nUM ijqx vwlI Aqy KVg Dwrn krn vwlI,

transliteration.en: faneear fu(n)kaaran baagh bukaaran sasatr prahaaran saadh mate ||

transliteration.en: saihathee sanaahan asaT prabaahan bol nibaahan tej atula(n) ||
